Blog.post: Oh Feci.. You funny funny guy.. I feel so special that you pay attention to thses posts that no one listens to.. I appreciate it.. lol.. Peace
Well its nice to know that someone listens to me.. haha.. who are you anyways.. and don't make me guess
its funny becuase im the only one that reads my posts.. Oh what a life i have.

Work today was a blast.. Yes I work at Subway if you didn't already know. its the place to be.. "would you like to make that a meal deal for 1.90??" anyways.. I just watched WIn a Date With Tad Hamilton.. Funny movie eh. Well I have good news... I am ungrounded :D its pretty exciting.. Well thats all for now.. Goodnight

Today I got my grounded on top of being grounded.. Therefore I have to stay in on the May 24 weekend which is pretty hellish if you ask me. My house is turning into a fucking nazi prison (don't take offense to that) No going out. No Msn. No conputer. No visitors. No food. ah i lied about that last one.. But honestly.. Its going to resort to that sooner or later.. I might as well get shipped off to boarding school for "bad girls" I need to get my frusteration out... FUCKUCKFUCKFUCKFUCKUCKFUCKFUCKFUCKUCKFUCKFUCKFUCKUCKFUCKFUCK.. that helped.. Well this has been an interesting evening.. Thats all for now.. peace out.. Anita..
Hiya there... This is a useless post.. Amen to that

Today I am grounded. Long story. I'm quite mad at the moment becuase my mom has locked me up in this hell hole. Anyways.. no complaints.. "the sun is shining.. the birds are chipring.. the kids are skateboarding" (emilie) I tried to get cheered up by watching vidoes on ebaums world, but even shfifty five didn't seem to help. Well on a happier note, its a nice day out.. too bad Im not allowed out. But all is fair.. School is tomorrow which isn't too fun but ah well. My mom told me that I'm grounded "until the cows come home" I truly don't understand that statement.. but I guess thats the whole point. AHHHH well.. I'm going to see how many times I can walk around my house in an hour.. then try to beat it.. Peace out
Making posts are fun.. It feels like a diary.. sorta.. no not really. I take back that uncalled for comment.. I found something to do.. So I am going out.. For good. Goodbye
Right now I am singing to myself some random Taking Back Sunday songs... Don't ask.. I am sure you wouldn't ask anyways.... Thats all for now. I'm bored. Peace.

I am sitting around.. I just ate a big chicken wrap.... and a chicken sub. I guess you could say I am in the chicken mood. Heh.. Anyways... Trying to figure out how to spend my night but all is fair. Tommorrow I get the privilage of working.. Subway is the best place.. So i encourage all to buy subs.. Plenty of them.. Amen to that Well im out.. Peace...

you know.. theres a very special someone.. the first person to ever care to listen to my pointless blogs.. that would be feci.. i've thanked you before.. and i'll thank you again.. thank you feci.. i truly appreciate it. i want you but not as bad as i want brittany thats all peace

Today is tuesday.. that means tomorrow is the LAST DAY OF SCHOOL!!!! that means.. 6 hours and 15 minutes 380 minutes 22,800 seconds 228,000 milliseconds WAHOO recital is this weekend.. my dances are.. thats it thats all(tappy).. hot lunch(boring)... milkshake(boo) and then theres finale which is always cool.. well folks.. thats it for now.. i must go put on my drag queen makeup :) peace

AH boo! Its so cold in this world.. literally. I've been cold for like 3 days straight, but no complaints. There are 1..2..3.. days left of school. Thats 18 hours and 45 minutes at school.. Thats 1125 minutes... Thats 67,500 seconds... Thats 675,000 miliseconds... Yeah I definitely have too much time on my hands. Its almost 4... woohoo. There'd not much more to say. Yeah. Thats all for today folks... (too bad no one listens to this) (((except feci)) (sometimes sam and brittany) Peace out

i just watched final destination 2.. it sorta puts me in that mood where i'm trying to avoid every danger in my house. i almost fell down the stairs which was scary. actually it was kinds funny. mmhm. its friday night and i have to work. boo! i have to work tomorrow too which is pure idiotsy. i'm scratching my back. a back scratcher would be great. i hope i become so rich that i can hire someone to scratch my back. heh heh.. well i gotta go joyfully put on my sexy subway uniform now :D rock on subway. peace

the most saddest thing just happened.. i just spend like half an hour writing this amazing blog.. then my computer went all wacked out.. and it was gone :( waaaaaaa.. so therefore i am too lazy to type it.. and plus i forgot what i wrote.. so amen to that peace out

today... was a hot......... ..................... day. emilie and i ate a freezie.. thank you BM.. they are good.. it was hot today eh? EH? i must stop acting canadian and let my italian side show through.. this is my italian "dov'e la staza de bagno" yeah. that means wheres the bathroom or something.. thats all i need to know. heh heh.. well i definitely have the eating down pretty good.. pizza gelato and wine! mmmmm mmmm! yummers!. i can't beleive i just said yummers. someone slap me. not literally.. heh one time i said to emilie "if i say that word again slap me" then i said the word and she slapped me and it hurt. mmhm.. dance recital is next week! woohooooooooo.. yea.. thats all for now.. there is a 6 inch subway melt on white bread with lettuce subsauce mayo and sweet onion sauce with MY name on it!!!!!!! Peace out

i feel special. i think i've said that a little too many times.. ehhehee if i ever want a threesome.. feci and sam will be my choices. lol ya just pretend i never said that.. lately i've been working a lot. too much. i didn't go out once this weekend.. but oh well. yes. money is fun. it does good things.. when used correctly.. i have this silly nelly furtado song stuck in my head.. it goes like "theres a shadown in the sky and it lokos like rain.. " so on and so forth.. anyways thats it for n ow bugger peace out

woohoo for rain! its emilies fault. she killed a spider yesterday anyways. last nite i came home from italy. italy is a very nice place. it is very fun. ah man everything there is just so much fun.. ahhhh.... the food is so good. the gelato is amazing. i swear i gained about 15 pounds from gelato alone. yum. the pizza is also sooo good. its really thin. and very tasty. i really don't like the eupopean electrical plugs. they are quite the hassel. oh well. anyways. im getting lazzzzzy. this jet lag is really taking a toll on me.. peace out ~anita
